text: The 1996 African Women's Handball Championship was the twelfth edition of the African Women's Handball Championship, held in Benin from 16 to 29 October 1996. It acted as the African qualifying tournament for the 1997 World Women's Handball Championship. ==Preliminary round== ===Group A=== \---- \---- ===Group B=== \---- \---- ==Knockout stage== ===Places 5–7=== \---- \---- ===Bracket=== ===Semifinals=== \---- ===Third place game=== ===Final=== ==Final ranking== {| class="infobox bordered" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 1997 World Championship |} {| class="wikitable" !Rank !Team |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:gold medal icon.svg|| |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:silver medal icon.svg|| |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:bronze medal icon.svg|| |- |align=center|4|| |- |align=center|5|| |- |align=center|6|| |- |align=center|7|| |} ==External links== *Results on todor66.com 1996 Women African Women's Handball Championship Category:1996 in African handball Hand Category:International sports competitions hosted by Benin Category:Women's handball in Benin Category:October 1996 sports events in Africa
title: 1996 African Women's Handball Championship
